skills.name: SCAR
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• Damage dealt increases based on your MR.

skills.name: SCURRY
desc: • Heal for 50% of your Missing HP.
• 50% Chance to Revive a random ally to full HP.

skills.name: CRAVING
desc: Inflicts enemies with Crave status for 3 turns at the start of battle. Crave reduces healing and causes enemies to take damage when they heal. Damage dealt increases with the heal amount.
